name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Amazon Seller Fee Invoice Exporter by Staxxer

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is a tool for downloading your Amazon Seller Fee invoices in bulk.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can filter your invoices by period, invoice type and the different marketplaces. Export it as a zip file, and youâ€™re done.

- Filter your invoices by dates, invoice type and marketplace (country). 

- Save a lot of time

- You receive it in a zip file with pdfs

- No account required (only your Amazon account)

- Real time linked to your Amazon account

- For all Amazon marketplaces (.com | .co.uk | .de | .co.jp | .fr | .ca | .it | .es | .in | .com.mx | .nl | se | .be)

Thank you for using the Staxxer Chrome Extension.
We hope it will save you plenty of valuable time. 

If you have any questions about your Cross-border European VAT, please write us an email at support@staxxer.com, to plan a free VAT analyses consult.
